ygData.subject: Re: What a difference 10 months makes (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: It s funny, I did exactly the same thing night before last.  I was the only PC in the entire zone (Qeynos). *boggle* Anyway, I m going to do the watch reports
ygData.messageBody:
It's funny, I did exactly the same thing night before
last. I was the only PC in the entire zone (Qeynos).
*boggle*

Anyway, I'm going to do the watch reports quest to get
my first level. Two runs = almost 1 bubble xp. Then
I'll try to slay the dastardly rats. I hope you
decide to keep with it. I'd love to meet you in game.

Tomerrilin
23rd Bard Mith Marr
1st Bard Test Server

--- Sylly Songsynger <jgs@...> wrote:
> with that success fresh in my mind, I started a bard
> on the test server
